Name: Jaron Vantomme
DESCRIPTION_1: I am a Full Stack Web Developer based in Belgium. I design and develop experiences that make people's lives easier.
WorkDescription: Most common methods for designing websites that work well on desktop are responsive and adaptive design.

Team-Project.title: Team Project
Team-Project.description: An interactive Flappy Bird app controlled via a trampoline, combining gaming and physical activity.

Social-Creativity-Cup-2020.title: Social Creativity Cup 2020
Social-Creativity-Cup-2020.description: During the lockdown we came up with a concept for a sustainable meeting garden, aimed at bringing together local residents with a biomeiler and renewable energy at its core.
Social-Creativity-Cup-2020.projectInfo: During the lockdown, we worked on an idea for an innovative project: a sustainable meeting garden to bring the Schiervelde neighbourhood closer together. This concept, which earned us the title of laureate at the Howest Social Creativity Cup 2020, revolves around sustainability and connection. We came up with a biomeiler, which would generate heat from the composting process of wood chips and thus supply a workshop space and greenhouse with energy. For the electricity needs of the garden, we proposed the use of solar panels on the Roeselare Expohallen, so that the entire project runs on renewable energy. In addition, we wanted to involve local residents from the start by inviting them as volunteers to build the biomeiler together. Although the project was not carried out, the aim was to design a social and sustainable initiative that is both environmentally friendly and community-strengthening.
